title: A Right-to-Repair Car Law Makes a Surprising U-Turn in Massachusetts
description: The Biden administration has changed its mind about a Massachusetts state law giving mechanics and car owners access to more diagnostic data.

title: Facebook’s 2024 Election Policy May Hinge on a Cambodian Video
description: Will former Cambodian prime minister Hun Sen's Facebook account be suspended? This decision could have huge ramifications for how Meta handles upcoming elections in India and the US.

title: Kids Are Going Back to School. So Is ChatGPT
description: Teachers are caught between cracking down on cheating with generative AI and using it to help empower students. It’s going to be a challenging year.
